name: Vegan Chickpea Tuna Salad Stuffed Poblano Peppers
description: This vegan chickpea tuna salad has mashed chickpeas, tomato, onion, serrano pepper, vegan mayo, olives, and capers. It is just the right amount of spicy and it is stuffed into a roasted poblano pepper.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 -1 tbsp. Liquid from pickled jalapeños (or lime juice)

recipeInstructions.text: Roast, peel, and deseeded the poblano peppers. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Roast, peel, and deseeded the poblano peppers. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Place chickpeas in a shallow bowl and use a fork to mash them up.
recipeInstructions.name: Place chickpeas in a shallow bowl and use a fork to mash them up.

recipeInstructions.text: Add tomatoes. onion, serrano, olives, capers and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add tomatoes. onion, serrano, olives, capers and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the vegan mayo and 1/2 tbsp. of pickled jalapeño liquid or lime juice. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the vegan mayo and 1/2 tbsp. of pickled jalapeño liquid or lime juice. Mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Season with salt and pepper and taste. If necessary, add remaining 1/2 tbsp. of pickled jalapeño liquid or lime juice.
recipeInstructions.name: Season with salt and pepper and taste. If necessary, add remaining 1/2 tbsp. of pickled jalapeño liquid or lime juice.

recipeInstructions.text: Place salad in fridge for 15 to 20 min. (optional)
recipeInstructions.name: Place salad in fridge for 15 to 20 min. (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Stuff the poblano peppers with the chickpea salad and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Stuff the poblano peppers with the chickpea salad and serve.

keywords: chickpea tuna salad, stuffed poblano peppers, vegan tuna salad
